name: AmazonStorytime
0:
”Alexa, open Amazon Storytime”
”Alexa, ask Amazon Storytime to tell me a bedtime story”
”Alexa, ask Amazon Storytime to tell me a LEGO story”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: amazon storytime
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Listen to a collection of 100+ short stories which are professionally narrated for kids ages 5-12. Choose from genres such as “Bedtime” or “Adventure” or let Alexa choose for you. 

Kids can choose from story categories including bedtime, silly, family, friends, or spin the magic story wheel for a surprise set of stories.

Check out super fun original stories from LEGO®, or go on an interactive story adventure with Ripley’s Believe It or Not.

Now, kids can also like or dislike a story so Alexa can remember their preferences. That way, they can choose to play stories just from the ‘liked’ list.


Try Saying Things Like:

“Alexa, ask Amazon Storytime to tell me a Ripley’s story.” 
“Alexa, ask Amazon Storytime to tell me silly stories.” 
“Alexa, like this story in Amazon Storytime”
“Alexa, don’t like this story in Amazon Storytime”
“Alexa, play my likes in Amazon Storytime”
“Alexa, next,” to skip a story. 
“Alexa, start over,” to go back to the beginning of a story. 
“Alexa, pause,” to take a break, and 
“Alexa, resume” to continue listening.
